attributes.action: Allow the entry of Geert Wilders into the UK to express his views.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Defend the right for Geert Wilders to express himself and his views to the British people. He is not spreading hatred  like Muslim extremist who openly support the 9/11 and 7/7 bombings. He wants to inform the British people of the problems that could occur and are occurring to this country and Europe through separation and polarisation rather than the integration of cultures which was intended.
